questions.question: How long have you been in business?
questions.answer: Ascent Group Construction has been serving the GTA since 2009, with over 15 years of experience delivering quality painting and stucco/EIFS services.

questions.question: Are you licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed contractors with comprehensive liability insurance and WSIB coverage. We provide proof of insurance with every estimate.

questions.question: Do you offer warranties?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide workmanship warranties on all projects, typically 2-5 years depending on the scope. We also offer manufacturer warranties on materials used.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We serve the entire Greater Toronto Area (GTA) including Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Brampton, and surrounding communities.

questions.question: How do you calculate estimates?
questions.answer: We provide detailed estimates based on square footage, surface condition, materials selected, and project complexity. Use our online estimator for instant ranges, or schedule a free on-site consultation for precise pricing.

questions.question: Do you offer free estimates?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide free, no-obligation estimates for all services. We'll visit your property, assess the scope, and provide a detailed written quote.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, checks, all major credit cards, and e-transfer. Payment schedules are outlined in your contract, typically with a deposit and final payment upon completion.

questions.question: Can I get financing?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with financing partners to offer flexible payment plans for qualified customers. Ask about financing options during your estimate.

questions.question: How long will my project take?
questions.answer: Timeline varies by project size: small interior jobs take 2-5 days, full house interiors 5-10 days, and exteriors 7-14 days weather permitting. We provide specific timelines in your estimate.

questions.question: Will you protect my furniture and belongings?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We carefully cover all furniture, floors, and fixtures with drop cloths and plastic sheeting. We can also help move lighter items if needed.

questions.question: Can I stay in my home during the work?
questions.answer: Yes, most clients stay home during interior projects. We work room-by-room to minimize disruption and ensure you always have access to essential areas.

questions.question: What if weather delays my exterior project?
questions.answer: We monitor weather closely and adjust schedules as needed. Your timeline includes weather contingencies, and we communicate any changes immediately.

questions.question: What paint brands do you use?
questions.answer: We use premium brands including Benjamin Moore, Sherwin-Williams, and Behr. We select products based on your specific needs, climate conditions, and budget.

questions.question: Do you offer eco-friendly options?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer low-VOC and zero-VOC paints, water-based products, and sustainable materials. Ask about our green options during your consultation.

questions.question: How do you ensure quality?
questions.answer: Quality starts with thorough surface prep and continues through careful application. We conduct multiple quality checks and a final walkthrough with you before considering the job complete.

questions.question: Can you match my existing color?
questions.answer: Yes, we use advanced color matching technology to perfectly match any existing color from a sample. We can also provide digital mockups of new color schemes.
